articles.description: Mack Trucks, which is owned by Stellantis-brand Volvo, confirmed a tentative agreement on a five-year contract early Monday.
articles.content:
The United Auto Workers union has reached a tentative contract agreement with Mack Trucks that covers about 4,000 workers in three states.
